info.sourceTextContent: En fin, misia Rosario pedía a Dios paciencia para tantas tribulaciones (las de la casa de Pardo eran para misia Rosario como propias). Si todo esto había llegado a oídos de Nucha por conducto de su marido o de su padre, no tenía nada de extraño que suspirase así.
info.suspiciousTextContent: Finally, Dona Rosario asked God for patience for so many hardships (those of home of Dona Rosario Pardo were for them as their own). If all this had reached the ears of Nucha through her husband or father, there was nothing unusual and sigh
